276440.name: Kingdom Tales: Dragons & Us
276440.description:
The day has come when mighty dragons seek new territory to claim as their own! Now, only the most courageous and just of leaders will be able forge a friendship between mankind and dragons.

In Kingdom Tales you will explore the land, gather, produce and trade resources, build and repair subjects' homes and community structures, and work to increase your subjects' level of happiness!

Along your journey, you will meet druids, forest fairies, trolls, dragons and other exciting creatures while racing against the clock to complete tasks in this gorgeous and fun time management and strategy game!

ğŸ•¹ Gameplay

Click / Tap to gather resources, build houses, manage workers, and keep your people thriving as you progress through each level. Use boosts when things get tough â€” but the real reward is mastering strategy and efficiency!

ğŸ® Play your way

Expand, optimize, upgrade, and develop your settlements the way you like. Customizable challenge â€” Relaxed, Standard, and Extreme difficulty modes. Earn Achievements as you complete objectives and perfect your strategy.

ğŸŒŒ Immersive adventure

The mix of colorful art, atmosphere, and story-rich progression paired with satisfying time-management and city-building mechanics. Whether you enjoy calm, casual resource gathering or intense strategic challenges â€” this game delivers both.

  • EXPLORE the fantasy world

  • MASTER 45 exciting levels

  • SOLVE hundreds of quests

  • ENSURE the welfare of your subjects

  • REBUILD the community

  • SAVE Dragons and make new friendships

  • EARN different achievements

  • 3 DIFFICULTY MODES: relaxed, timed and extreme

  • Step-by-step TUTORIALS for beginners
